title: Doughn't Let Me Go
description: It was just supposed to be one night.No kissing. No feelings. A wham-bam-thank-you-ma’am tangle in the sheets and we go our own ways.Only it’s a small town, and I was bound to run into the irresistible Porter Jones again.I just didn’t expect it to be at my job interview…which he’s conducting.Now the live-in nanny to his adorable seven-year-old daughter, I’m doing my best to avoid falling for his charms.Except it’s much harder than either of us anticipated.What’s a few romps between friends?No kissing. No feelings. Just fun.Sounds simple, right?Right…
author: Teagan Hunter
